Time Classes¶

Time intervals are handled in a uniform manner using the TimeInterval and TimeUnit classes.

TimeInterval¶

class rgma.TimeInterval(value, units=TimeUnit.SECONDS)¶

Encapsulates a time value and the units being used.

Time intervals may not be negative

Parameters:
  • value (int) – length of the time interval
  • units (rgma.TimeUnit) – the units of the measurement
getValueAs([units=TimeUnit.SECONDS])¶

Returns the length of the time interval in the specified units.

Parameter:units (rgma.TimeUnit) – the units of the measurement
Returns:an int with the length of the time interval in the specified units

TimeUnit¶

class rgma.TimeUnit¶

Time units of various lengths - each represented by a class variable.

SECONDS¶

A time unit of seconds

MINUTES¶

A time unit of minutes

HOURS¶

A time unit of hours

DAYS¶

A time unit of days
